Row.Text: Nomadism
Nomadism
The advent of a advanced nomadic lifestyle, far beyond mere hunter-gather, but rather pastoral and peripatetic lifestyles
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tipis[ENDCOLOR], which produce faith and food.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I give thee flight without wings" -- Allegedly a Bedouin Proverb[NEWLINE][TAB]
Axe-Throwing
Axe-Throwing
With improvements in the crafting of weapons, the axe, already a formidable melee weapon, has had its ranged potential realised.
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hand-axemen[ENDCOLOR], a classical-era military unit.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"...dreamed up cruelties even barbarians would flinch at" -- Andromache, The Women of Troy[NEWLINE][TAB]
Fortification
Fortification
The construction of fortifications has lead to the development of alternative methods of construction and new architectures.
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Motte-and-Bailey Castle[ENDCOLOR], a fortification providing only a 25% defensive bonus, but it also deals 10 damage to adjacent enemy units.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Life yields only to be conqueror." - William the Conqueror[NEWLINE][TAB]
Pontoon Bridges
Pontoon Bridges
With improvements in engineering and construction, long bridges over water can be made through the use of pontoons.
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pontoon Bridges[ENDCOLOR] over water to connect land tiles.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The love of glory is like the bridge that Satan built across Chaos to pass from Hell to Paradise" -- Napoleon[NEWLINE][TAB]
Coal Machinery
Coal Machinery
With the advent of the use of coal for steel and power, basic steam machinery can be built.
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Airships[ENDCOLOR], a hovering military unit, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Land Ironclads[ENDCOLOR], an early industrial tank.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Oh, the humanity!" -- Herbert Morrison[NEWLINE][TAB]
Tunneling
Tunneling
Cutting a hole through stone is a conceptually simple but logistically difficult enterprise. An understanding of load bearing architecture, explosives, and boring machines.
Tunneling allows you to build a unit capable of building railroads through mountains.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The shortest distance between any two points is a line." -Archimedes[NEWLINE][TAB]
Forestry
Forestry

Afforestation, the practice of planting trees where there were none, can be used to improve the climate of an area by preventing toilsoil erosion, serving as wind barriers or habitats, and by creating a source of lumber. This, along with Reforestation, is a main defense against climate change.
Forestry allows you to plant trees anywhere except deserts or snow.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago." -Warren Buffett[NEWLINE][TAB]
